pageTitle: Itinerary for Sunday, August 20, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Sunday, August 20, 2017:

Montréal, Quebec

8:40 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a Welcome Ceremony for Leo Varadkar, Taoiseach of Ireland.

Royal Highland Regiment Armoury
4185 chemin de la Côte-des-Neiges
Montréal, Quebec

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity only
  • Media should arrive no later than 8:00 a.m.

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will hold a bilateral meeting with the Taoiseach of Ireland.

Queen Elizabeth Hotel, Rue Sherbrooke Room, Convention Floor
900 Boulevard René-Lévesque West
Montréal, Quebec

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity only
  • Media should arrive no later than 9:00 a.m.

10:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will hold a joint media availability with the Taoiseach of Ireland.

Queen Elizabeth Hotel, Van Horne Room, Convention Floor
900 Boulevard René-Lévesque West
Montréal, Quebec

Note for media:

  • Media should arrive no later than 9:45 a.m.

11:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will deliver brief remarks prior to the Montréal Pride Parade.

IBM Marathon Tower, Lobby
1250 Boulevard René-Lévesque
Montréal, Quebec

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media should arrive no later than 11:00 a.m.

12:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the Montréal Pride Parade.

Boulevard René-Lévesque at Rue Drummond
Montréal, Quebec

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity for accredited media
  • Accredited media should gather at the corner of Boulevard René-Lévesque and Rue Drummond no later than 11:30 a.m.

4:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the India Day Parade and will deliver remarks.

Avenue Querbes at Rue Ogilvy
Montréal, Quebec

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media should arrive at the corner of Avenue Querbes at Rue Ogilvy no later than 3:30 p.m.
